src:
Sesi I
Oktober Inflasi, IHSG Terjungkal ke Zona Merah di Level 6.204
01 Nov 2019, 04:50 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) ditutup negatif siang ini. Usai pengumuman data inflasi Oktober 2019, IHSG terus turun hingga 23 poin (0,38%) ke level 6.204.Sebaliknya, nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah siang ini turun tipis ke level Rp 14.057.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG minus 2 poin (0,04%) ke 6.225. Indeks LQ45 turun 2,6 poin (0,27%) ke 996.Membuka perdagangan Jumat (1/11/2019), IHSG terus turun 15 poin (0,25%) ke level 6.213. Sementara indeks LQ45 turun 2,9 poin ke 981.Hingga sesi I berakhir, IHSG turun hingga 23 poin (0,38%) ke level 6.204. Sedangkan indeks LQ45 melemah 4,5 poin (0,46%) ke level 980.Perdagangan saham ditransaksikan 312.993 kali dengan nilai Rp 4 triliun. Sebanyak 125 saham menguat, 244 saham turun, dan 146 saham tak berubah.Bursa Amerika Serikat ditutup Melemah. Dow Jones ditutup 27,046.23 (-0.52%), NASDAQ ditutup 8,292.36 (-0.14%), S&P 500 ditutup 3,037.57 (-0.30%). Bursa saham US ditutup melemah meskipun laporan keuangan beberapa perusahaan di US lebih baik daripada perkiraan analis. Investor pada sesi perdagangan kemarin lebih berfokus pada perkembangan perjanjian dagang antara US dan China yang sebelumnya mendapatkan informasi dari negara Chille dimana US dan China akan bertemu di sebuah acara, ternyata dibatalkan oleh Chille. President Trump telah mengumumkan bahwa US dan China sedang mencari lokasi untuk melanjutkan penandatanganan perjanjian dagang fase 1.Bursa Asia siang ini masih bergerak variatif, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 turun 111 poin ke 22.815
Indeks Hang Seng bertambah 113 poin ke 27.020
Indeks Shanghai naik 21 poin ke 2.950
Indeks Strait Times melemah 0,5 poin ke 3.229

Saham-saham yang masuk jajaran top gainers antara lain Dian Swastatika (DSSA) naik Rp 975 ke Rp 18.475, Indocement Tunggal (INTP) naik Rp 725 ke Rp 20.725, Asuransi Sinarmas (LIFE) naik Rp 700 ke Rp 5.800, Sinar Mas Multiartha (SMMA) naik Rp 475 ke Rp 10.100.Sementara saham-saham yang masuk jajaran top losers di antaranya Gudang Garam (GGRM) turun Rp 1.575 ke Rp 54.525, Indo Tambangraya (ITMG) turun Rp 725 ke Rp 12.575, Sentral Mitra (LUCK) turun Rp 325 ke Rp 975.Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/ara)
text:
Session I
October Inflation, JCI Falling into the Red Zone at Level 6,204
Nov 01 2019, 04:50 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) closed negative this afternoon. After the announcement of October 2019 inflation data, CSPI continued to fall by 23 points (0.38%) to 6,204 levels. Conversely, the exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this afternoon edged down to the level of Rp 14,057. On pre-trade, JCI minus 2 points (0.04%) to 6,225. The LQ45 index fell 2.6 points (0.27%) to 996. Opening trading on Friday (11/01/2019), the JCI continued to fall 15 points (0.25%) to 6,213. While the LQ45 index fell 2.9 points to 981. Until the first session ended, the Jakarta Composite Index dropped by 23 points (0.38%) to 6,204. While the LQ45 index fell 4.5 points (0.46%) to 980. Stock trading was traded 312,993 times with a value of Rp 4 trillion. A total of 125 shares rose, 244 shares fell, and 146 shares remained unchanged. The United States Stock Exchange closed down. Dow Jones closed 27,046.23 (-0.52%), NASDAQ closed 8,292.36 (-0.14%), S&P 500 closed 3,037.57 (-0.30%). US stock markets closed lower despite the financial statements of several US companies that were better than analyst estimates. Investors at yesterday's trading session focused more on the development of a trade agreement between the US and China which had previously received information from the Chille country where the US and China would meet at an event, apparently canceled by Chille. President Trump has announced that the US and China are looking for locations to continue signing the phase 1. trade agreement. Asia is still moving varied this afternoon, following its movements:

The Nikkei 225 index fell 111 points to 22,815
The Hang Seng Index added 113 points to 27,020
The Shanghai index rose 21 points to 2,950
The Strait Times Index fell 0.5 points to 3,229

Shares that are in the ranks of top gainers include Dian Swastatika (DSSA), up Rp 975 to Rp 18,475, Indocement Tunggal (INTP) up Rp 725 to Rp 20,725, Sinarmas Insurance (LIFE) up Rp 700 to Rp 5,800, Sinar Mas Multiartha ( SMMA) rose Rp 475 to Rp 10,100. While stocks that entered the ranks of top losers included Gudang Garam (GGRM) down Rp 1,575 to Rp 54,525, Indo Tambangraya (ITMG) down Rp 725 to Rp 12,575, Sentral Mitra (LUCK) down Rp 325 to Rp 975. Watch the video "Dollar Breaks Rp 14,200" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / fig)
